<h1 align="center">
  Atika Website is powered with Gatsby boilerplate
</h1>


## ðŸš€ Quick start
 
1.  **Setup.**

    ```sh
    npm install
    ```

2.  **Start developing.**

    ```sh
    gatsby develop
    ```

3.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

## ðŸ’« Deploy

1.  **Developing.**

    ```sh
    gatsby build -> and deploy all files from 'public' folder
    ```
